question: Frugal engineering is defined as the process of:
option1: raising the profit of a firm by reducing labour and capital cost
option2: reducing the complexity and cost of a good and its production
option3: accelerating the profit of a firm by adoption of science-based innovations
option4: increasing  customer base by offering discounts to customers
answer: reducing the complexity and cost of a good and its production
explanation: Frugal Engineering is the process of reducing the complexity and cost of a good and its production. It includes removal of nonessential features from durable goods such as a car or phone, in order to sell it inÂ developing countries to low income consumers.
